# USAccDeaths

```{r fig.width=7.5}
library(forecast)
library(ahead)

(obj <- suppressWarnings(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=MASS::glm.nb)))

plot(obj)

(obj <- suppressWarnings(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=stats::glm)))
plot(obj)

(obj <- suppressWarnings(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=MASS::rlm)))
plot(obj)

(obj <- suppressWarnings(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=rvfl::rvfl)))
plot(obj)

(obj <- suppressWarnings(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=MASS::lqs)))
plot(obj)
```

```{r fig.width=7.5}
(obj <- suppressWarnings(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=stats::lsfit)))
plot(obj)
```

```{r fig.width=7.5}
(obj <- suppressWarnings(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=stats::lm)))
plot(obj)
```

```{r fig.width=7.5}
(obj <- suppressWarnings(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=gam::gam)))
plot(obj)
```

```{r fig.width=7.5}
(obj <- suppressWarnings(ahead::glmthetaf(USAccDeaths, h=25L, fit_func=quantreg::rq)))
plot(obj)
```
